Arrangement.text:
Intro: C - Em - D (X4)
Verse 1: [G]I am chosen I am free I am living f[Em]or eternity F[C]ree now forever [G]You picked me up turned me around You set my feet on solid[Em] ground Y[C]ours now forever [G]
Pre-Chorus: [C]And no[Em]thing's gonna hold me b[D]ack Nothing's gonn[C]a hold me back No[Em]thing's gonna hol[D]d me back
Chorus: [G]My chains fell off [D]my heart was free I'm a[Em]live to live for You I'm al[D]ive to live for You
[G]Amazing Love, how c[D]an it be? You gave [Em]everything for me You gave e[D]verything for me Everyt[C]hing
{new_page} Verse 2: [G]You washed my sin and shame away The slate is cle[Em]an a brand new day F[C]ree now forever [G]Now boldly I approach Your throne To claim this crown [Em]through Christ my own Y[C]ours now forever [G]
Instrumental: G - D - Em - D (X4)
Bridge: I'm f[C]ree to live free[D] to give [Em]Free to be I'm free to love You I'm f[C]ree to live free[D] to give [Em]Free to be I'm free to love You I'm f[C]ree to live free[D] to give [Em]Free to be I'm free [C]to love You Lord
Arrangement.searchtext: intro c em d x4 verse 1 i am chosen i am free i am living for eternity free now forever you picked me up turned me around you set my feet on solid ground yours now forever prechorus and nothings gonna hold me back nothings gonna hold me back nothings gonna hold me back chorus my chains fell off my heart was free im alive to live for you im alive to live for you amazing love how can it be you gave everything for me you gave everything for me everything verse 2 you washed my sin and shame away the slate is clean a brand new day free now forever now boldly i approach your throne to claim this crown through christ my own yours now forever instrumental g d em d x4 bridge im free to live free to give free to be im free to love you im free to live free to give free to be im free to love you im free to live free to give free to be im free to love you lord
